cast.overview: A boy named George Jung grows up in a struggling family in the 1950's. His mother nags at her husband as he is trying to make a living for the family. It is finally revealed that George's father cannot make a living and the family goes bankrupt. George does not want the same thing to happen to him, and his friend Tuna, in the 1960's, suggests that he deal marijuana. He is a big hit in California in the 1960's, yet he goes to jail, where he finds out about the wonders of cocaine. As a result, when released, he gets rich by bringing cocaine to America. However, he soon pays the price.
cast.title: Blow

cast.overview: Siblings Wednesday and Pugsley Addams will stop at nothing to get rid of Pubert, the new baby boy adored by parents Gomez and Morticia. Things go from bad to worse when the new "black widow" nanny, Debbie Jellinsky, launches her plan to add Fester to her collection of dead husbands.
cast.title: Addams Family Values

details.biography:
Monet Happy Mazur (born April 17, 1976) is an American actress, model and musician. She is best known as Laura Fine-Baker on The CW show All American.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Monet Mazur, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Monet Mazur
